title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Elementary Student Collaboration Through Productive Failure-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply productive failure strategies in three or more collaborative problem-solving projects over four weeks through self-directed scheduling.
Learners can improve peer-assessment-based solutions by 80%+ using group discussion and feedback features in an LMS.

Learners complete project deliverables addressing scientific concepts (e.g., plant adaptation) using digital collaboration tools, improving conceptual understanding by 30% compared to baseline assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
